account.change_email_toast: Check your inbox for a confirmation email
account.login_failed: Couldn't log you in: check your email and password
account.dob_why: We need your date of birth in order to comply with applicable laws, such as COPPA in the United States and the GDPR in the European Union. They, and other countries' legislation, require that we confirm your age.

subscription.user_already_gold: You are already Gold, you cannot subscribe twice!
subscription.user_already_pro: You are already Pro, you cannot subscribe twice!
subscription.payment_disclaimer: Thank you for supporting Vanillo! Note that it could take a few minutes for activation to complete.

live.beginning: This is the beginning of the live chat
live.cooldown: 5 second cooldown is enabled for messages

feed.empty_feed_title: We have nothing to show here... yet.
feed.empty_feed_details: Go ahead and explore the homepage, then follow creators you like and their latest videos and posts will show here!

posts.empty: This profile has not made any posts yet.
posts.blank_title: You cannot have a blank title.
posts.delete_fail: Post failed to delete, please try again
posts.confirm_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
posts.could_not_delete: Could not delete post, no active profile
posts.could_not_edit: Could not edit post, no active profile
posts.could_not_create: Could not create post, no active profile
posts.comments_none: You have reached the end of the comments for this post

modal.delete_comment_title: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

comments.none: There are no comments on this video.

creator_portal.creator_news_wip_blurb: This section is being worked on at the moment! When it is available, you'll see a short blurb for the latest article.
creator_portal.no_videos_yet: You don't have any videos yet.

monetize.title: Vanillo Monetization Program
monetize.subtitle: Get paid to upload!

marketing.ad_share_desc: We'll share a portion of ad revenue with you and give you a share of Vanillo Gold users' subscription fee depending on how much they watch your content.
marketing.tipping_title: Get tips directly from your fans.
marketing.tipping_desc: Allow your biggest supporters to tip you directly on your videos with Vanillo. We only take a small fee, and it's convenient for you and your fans.
marketing.membership_desc: Set up a membership system directly on Vanillo. Your biggest fans can join your customized membership tiers and get perks from you such as member-only videos.
marketing.live_tipping_title: Get paid to live stream with Live Tipping.
marketing.live_tipping_desc: Fans in supported countries can tip you while you stream with Live Tipping. Their chat message will be highlighted so that you notice their generosity.

requirement_list.partner_desc: Only Vanillo Partners can be monetized at this time.
requirement_list.country_title: Be located in a supported country
requirement_list.country_desc: Currently, we're beta-testing monetization in the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada and the European Union.

monetize.eligible: Congratulations, you meet the requirements! Apply above.
monetize.not_eligible: Sorry, you're not (yet) a Vanillo Partner.
monetize.apply_partner: Apply here to become a Vanillo Partner!
monetize.not_owner: You must be the owner of this profile to set up monetization.

takedown.takedown_notice_copyright: This video is no longer available due to a copyright claim.
takedown.takedown_notice_tos: This video is no longer available due to violating the Vanillo Terms of Service and/or Community Guidelines.
takedown.takedown_notice_generic: This video has been removed from Vanillo due to a copyright claim, or a violation of the Terms of Service.

history.none: You don't have any watch history yet.
history.confirm_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete ALL videos from your watch history?

message.404_text: Try using the search bar at the top of the page. If you still can't find what you were looking for, this page may have been moved or deleted.
message.redirect: Click here if you are not redirected
message.out_confirm: Are you sure you want to leave Vanillo?
message.agree: I agree to the Terms & Conditions
message.click_upload: or click here to choose one
message.cta_upload: Upload a video to see something here.
message.drag_drop_upload: Drag and drop a file here to upload
message.error_text: Our code has ran into an error it was not expecting. We've collected error information about this event. Feel free to reload at any time. If you keep seeing this error, contact support and reference the above message
message.follow_someone: Follow someone and they will show up here.
message.no_bio: No bio, this user doesn't have anything to say...
message.no_description: This video doesn't have a description.
message.no_videos_yet: You don't have any uploads yet!
message.password_reset_requested: Reset password link requested, check your inbox
message.search_no_result_details: Try broadening your search, or use some different keywords
message.search_no_result_title: No results could be found for
message.title: Title
message.welcome_text: Create your profile to begin exploring.
message.welcome_enter_info: Enter your information to create your account
message.welcome_verify_text: Please check your inbox and spam folder for our confirmation email to proceed
message.welcome_banned_text: You are either not signed in, or you are banned
message.beta_notice: Notice: Vanillo is in constant development. Please make sure to report all bugs to our support portal:

settings.edit_profile: Want to edit your profile instead?

settings.theme_saved: Theme setting saved for this browser

mfa.disclaimer: WARNING: If backup codes are lost and you no longer have access to the device which provides the MFA codes, you cannot recover your account without extensive identity verification. Backup codes will only be shown ONCE and then you will never be provided them again. If you forget your backup codes, lose them, or run out, you must reset your MFA
mfa.confirm: Are you absolutely sure you want to disable MFA for your account? This is irreversible and will require you to setup a new MFA code.

uploader.before_leave: Are you sure you want to leave the upload page? Leaving will make any currently processing video private by default. You can change this in the creator portal.
uploader.rate_limit_reached: You have reached your 24 hour video limit. Try again tomorrow.
uploader.error_processing: There was an error processing this video

features.4k_desc: Make your videos pop in high quality 4K
features.ads_desc: Contribute directly to the creators you love
features.flac_desc: Bless your ears with the highest quality audio we serve
features.live_desc: Gain access to live streaming, when available
features.look_desc: Make Vanillo look the way you want
features.orig_desc: By subscribing, you gain access to our collection of original content
features.prior_desc: Get in before others to have your uploads processed
features.support_desc: Subscribing helps keep a small site like ours afloat

subscribe.learn_pro: Click to learn more about Pro

subscribe.subscribe_title: Get the whole bucket, not just a scoop.
